name: Acidic Flask
description: A flask filled with a highly corrosive acid.
looks: The flask is made of thick glass and the acid inside is bubbling and emitting a toxic fume.

name: Ice Sword
description: A sword made of ice that freezes enemies upon impact.
looks: The sword has a transparent, icy blade with a hilt made of frost-covered metal.

special_effects.Freezing: Has a chance to freeze enemies for 3 seconds upon successful hit.

special_weapon_skills.Swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Quick Healing Potion
description: A potion that rapidly restores a large amount of health.
looks: A small glass vial filled with a sparkling blue liquid.

name: Health Restoration Potion
description: A potion that restores a small amount of health.
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a glowing blue liquid.

name: Slow Healing Potion
description: A potion that restores health points.
looks: A small, glass vial filled with a glowing, green liquid.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the fireball spell, allowing the user to cast a powerful fireball.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and has intricate arcane symbols inscribed upon it.

special_effects.burn: Targets hit by the fireball have a chance to be set on fire, taking additional damage over time.

name: Speed Elixir
description: An elixir that enhances the user's speed for a short duration.
looks: The elixir is a small glass bottle filled with a sparkling orange liquid.

name: Vorpal Sword
description: A legendary sword known for its ability to sever heads with a single strike.
looks: The Vorpal Sword is a long, silver blade with an intricate hilt and a glowing blue edge.

special_weapon_skills.Sword Mastery: Increases damage dealt with swords by 10%.

special_effects.Severing Strike: 25% chance to instantly kill the target.

name: Mana Restoration Potion
description: Restores a portion of the user's mana
looks: A small vial filled with a shimmering blue liquid

name: Wisdom Elixir
description: An elixir that enhances wisdom and spell power for a short period of time.
looks: A small glass bottle containing a glowing purple liquid.
